text: hēḷiri; avaru adeṣṭu kāla (alli) iddarembudannu allāhanē heccu ballanu. Avanu ākāśagaḷa hāgū bhūmiya ella gupta samācāragaḷannū ballanu. Avanu itarellariginta cennāgi avugaḷannu nōḍuttāne mattu kēḷuttāne. Avugaḷige (bhūmyākāśagaḷige) avana horatu bēre pōṣakarilla. Avanu tanna ādhipatyadalli yārannū pālugoḷisuvudilla
